articles.content: Private sector Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd has plans to foray into credit cards and personal loan segments as it expects to build a consumer finance portfolio, a top official said. Equitas Small F… [+2505 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Gujarat Gas hikes industrial gas price from August 21: Sources - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Gujarat Gas has hiked the price for industrial gas after five straight price cuts in 2023.
articles.content: Gujarat Gas Limited has increased industrial gas price by Rs 2.40 to Rs 40.83 per standard cubic metre (scm) from the existing Rs 38.43 per scm, CNBC-TV18 reported on August 20, citing sources. The p… [+1100 chars]

articles.title: M-cap of seven of top 10 firms down by Rs 80,200 cr; TCS, HDFC Bank biggest laggards - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the top 10 pack, Reliance Industries, Hindustan Unilever and Infosys were the gainers while Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, ITC, State Bank of India, Bharti Airtel and Bajaj Finance saw a decline in their valuation. The market val…
